Talking Points                                               Automated Records Management System
Domestic Partnership Benefits for Same-Sex Couples                   HOli.Qump Conversion
Socarides 7-21-97



·     I understand that many private sector employers are beginning to offer some type of
      benefit in this area and that the law that recently took effect in Hawaii provides certain
      benefits to same-sex couples. I also know that the DNC recently instituted such a
      policy. And Barney Frank has talked to me about legislation he intends to introduce
      which would provide these benefits for federal employees.

·     I had previously asked Bruce Reed, my domestic policy adviser, to look at these issues
      and he is doing so while at the same time monitoring the developments in the private
      sector.

·     While I'm sympathetic to many of the concerns raised, I think we will have to moniter for
      a time how these policies work in practice and take a hard look at what's happening in the
      private sector and in communities which have instituted such policies.
